=================
**Title:** Ultra-Microbalance Instrument - K3D56-230292
---------------------------------------------

**Reference Number:** WS3694484474-Doc3696025335
**Amendment Number:** 2

### Notice Details

*   **Posting Date:** October 21, 2022
*   **Closing Date:** November 18, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST

### Notice Type

This notice is a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the Competitive - Open Bidding procurement method.

### Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to submit proposals for the supply and delivery of one ultra-microbalance instrument, model K3D56-230292. The selected bidder will provide the instrument, in accordance with the required specifications, to be used in a temperature and humidity-controlled cleanroom for the measurement of particulate matter.

**Required Specifications**

Bidders must clearly demonstrate compliance with each mandatory technical criterion. Any offer that does not meet these specifications will be deemed non-responsive and will not be considered.

**Contact Information**

For any questions or concerns, please contact Harvey, Christopher (SPAC/PSPC):

*   Email: [christopher.harvey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:christopher.harvey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   Phone: (519) 671-2396

### Notice URL

The notice and any supporting documents can be found on the Ariba Discovery platform: 
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14433467?extsite=MTQ0MzM0NjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Selection Criteria

The contract will be awarded to the lowest-priced bidder who meets all mandatory requirements and submissions are compliant with the technical criteria.

### Trade Agreements

This opportunity is open to bidders under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA).

### Region of Opportunity

The contract is exercisable in the province of Ontario, excluding the National Capital Region.  Delivery will also be made in the province of Ontario, excluding the National Capital Region

Please note that all bids must be submitted on or before the closing date and time specified. Any late submissions will be considered non-responsive.

Specifications for the ultra-microbalance, including technical requirements and delivery details, are included with the notice on the Ariba Discovery platform.
